alert.note: Alert for Central Black Hills; Custer Co Plains; Hermosa Foot Hills; Pennington Co Plains; Rapid City; Southern Black Hills (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 12 at 1:44AM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Custer and south central Pennington Counties through 215 AM MDT... At 144 AM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Hermosa, or 16 miles south of Rapid City, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Hermosa, Keystone, Hayward, Mount Rushmore National Memorial, Center Lake, Legion Lake, State Game Lodge, Thompson Butte, Black Hills Playhouse, Horse Thief Lake and northern Custer State Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 700 AM MDT for southwestern and west central South Dakota.

area.areaDesc: Central Black Hills; Custer Co Plains; Hermosa Foot Hills; Pennington Co Plains; Rapid City; Southern Black Hills
